Name: Pandemic Pandemonium
About the game: Pandemic Pandemonium is a fast paced arcade shooter for the 2020s with an aesthetic synthwave soundtrack. Take control of your king of a tiger to battle the coronavirus with your ample stores of toilet paper, PPE, and vaccine boosters. Don't let too many coronaviruses escape or the global pandemic will reach catastrophic levels!
